task_descriptions: You are @FullName-1 and would like to submit a fraud report. @Fraud-1 Your account number is @AccountNumber-1 and your PIN is @PIN-1.

You are @FullName-1 and would like to report fraud on your bank account. @Fraud-1. Unfortunately, you don't remember your account number nor your PIN. Your date of birth is @DOB-1. For your security questions, your mother's maiden name is @Mother-1 and your childhood pet is @Pet-1.
completion_requirements: You have reported fraud for your bank account.
completion_questions: Did the AI Assistant succesfully report fraud on your account?
Did the AI Assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

Wizard.task_description: Authenticate the user and submit a fraud report
